item.title: georginalgreen@gmail.com on "Microsoft access on sharepoint to create database ultimately destined 4 website?"
item.dc:creator: georginalgreen@gmail.com
item.description: We are at the very start of a project which will populate a relational database with information from archives across the world. There will be three people working on the database and ultimately we want it to be openly available and searchable as an online research tool. Would Microsoft access on sharepoint be a good way of facilitating the collaborative research?
